**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Iron strips line the body of an _accursed staff_, capping the bottom and folding into an intricate knot at the top. While wielding an _accursed staff_, you're empowered by the curses you inflict. If an enemy fails a saving throw against a spell you cast that has the [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) trait, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to double that spell's level. These temporary Hit Points last 10 minutes. The enemy must be a significant threat and can't have been a willing subject of the curse. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Accursed Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 250 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
  • **1st** [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [_ill omen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=696)
  • **2nd** [_blood vendetta_](/Spells.aspx?ID=675), [_warrior's regret_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1030)
Accursed Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_claim curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=884), [_cup of dust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=572)
  • **4th** [_outcast's curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=211), [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), _warrior's regret_
Accursed Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_inevitable disaster_](/Spells.aspx?ID=930), [_mariner's curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=184)
  • **6th** [_blinding fury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=672), [_feeblemind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), _remove curse_
name: Accursed Staff (Major)
